segments.text: The boy is being so brave, climbing up that stool to get cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm a bit fearful for him, that stool looks like it's going to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share of the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They seem to be working together, like a little team.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so far, he's really determined to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they're going to share the cookies or if it's each for themselves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water on the floor doesn't seem to bother them at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they're having a little adventure, trying to get cookies without their mom knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is almost empty, they must really love cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't fall and hurt themselves, that would ruin their fun.
segments.speaker: PAR
